meanings.definition: A soft, flabby area of the body
meanings.sent1: She pinched the pudge on her stomach.
meanings.sent2: The baby's chubby cheeks had a cute pudge.
meanings.sent3: The pudge on the teddy bear made it extra cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The pudge on the dough was perfect for making soft cookies.
meanings.sent5: The pudge on the puppy's belly jiggled when it wagged its tail.

meanings.definition: To have a soft, flabby body
meanings.sent1: After the holidays, he tends to pudge a bit.
meanings.sent2: She doesn't exercise much, so she tends to pudge.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he would pudge his way through winter hibernation.
meanings.sent4: The cake batter will pudge if you mix it too much.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream will pudge if left out in the sun for too long.

meanings.definition: To gain weight in a soft, flabby manner
meanings.sent1: If you keep eating like that, you'll pudge up quickly.
meanings.sent2: She tends to pudge up during the colder months.
meanings.sent3: He didn't realize how fast he would pudge up after quitting the gym.
meanings.sent4: The bear will pudge up before hibernation to stay warm.
meanings.sent5: The dough will pudge up as it rises in the oven.
